mapper.select: select user_id as userId from carts where cart_id=#{cartId}

select ci.product_id as productId, ci.amount as amount, ci.shipping as shipping, p.product_price as totalPrice, p.product_image as productImage, p.product_name as productName, p.product_price as productPrice from cart_items ci join products p on ci.product_id = p.product_id where ci.cart_id = #{cartId}

SELECT od.order_detail_id AS orderDetailId, od.product_id AS productId, od.order_id AS orderId, od.amount as amount, od.total_price as totalPrice, od.shipping as shipping,
p.product_name as productName, p.product_price as productPrice, p.product_image as productImage FROM order_details od JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE od.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT o.order_id AS orderId, o.user_id AS userId, o.order_date AS orderDate, SUM(od.total_price) AS totalPrice FROM orders o JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY o.order_id;
